Question & Options:
In the movie 'Gadar: Ek Prem Katha' (2001), which of the following statements are true regarding the song 'Udja Kale Kawan'?
Options:
A. A. It is a folk song.
B. B. It is related to marriage.
C. C. Both versions of the song are connected to the theme of travel and migration.
D. D. The song was released in a different movie.
Correct Answer: A, B, C

Question & Options:
In the movie 'Gadar: Ek Prem Katha' (2001), which of the following songs depict the theme of travel and migration during the partition in 1947?
Options:
A. udja kale kawan (folk)
B. musafir jaane wale
C. chura liya hai tumne jo dil ko
D. tujhe dekha to yeh jaana sanam
Correct Answer: udja kale kawan (folk), musafir jaane wale

B. Main Nikla Gaddi Le Ke
C. Tera Mera Pyaar
D. Ghar Aaja Pardesi
Correct Answer: Udja Kale Kawan, Main Nikla Gaddi Le Ke
